entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:22 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.4°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -12.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or snow this evening then to light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
